name: Live2DViewerEX
description: The best cross-platform Live2D desktop solution
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (with Aero), 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: HD Graphics 4000 or above DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel i7 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD HD7870, 2 GB VRAM or above DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 600 MB available space
